# [FEAT] Intelligent Triage

## Labels
`ai`, `automation`, `priority:high`

## Description
Implement AI-powered intelligent triage to automatically categorize, prioritize, and route tickets.

## Requirements

### Auto-Classification
- Intent detection
- Category prediction
- Priority suggestion
- Language detection
- Sentiment analysis

### Routing Decisions
- Group assignment
- Agent assignment
- Skill-based routing
- Workload consideration
- Urgency handling

### Triage Actions
- Set ticket fields
- Add tags
- Set priority
- Route to queue
- Trigger workflows

### Learning & Improvement
- Model training on historical data
- Confidence scoring
- Human feedback loop
- Accuracy metrics
- Continuous improvement

### Configuration
- Enable/disable triage
- Confidence thresholds
- Override rules
- Fallback handling
- Channel-specific settings

### Reporting
- Triage accuracy
- Distribution analytics
- Time savings
- Model performance
- Trend analysis

## Zendesk Reference
Intelligent triage can automatically route email and messaging tickets to the right teams based on what the ticket is about (intent), language, or sentiment.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Intent detection works
- [ ] Auto-routing functional
- [ ] Confidence scoring available
- [ ] Learning improves over time
- [ ] Accuracy reporting available
